Where is AConf defined?
Please run gcc -E on this file in the same manner in which you compile it 
(w/include paths, etc.) so that I can see the entire picture. 
Thanks

Reproducing this example using the latest out of CVS (for CDT 2.0) yields the 
proper result.  We have done a significant amount of work in refining Search 
and Open Declarations in this release.  

Since we are not planning on doing a 1.2.2 release, I must mark this defect as 
WONTFIX for the CDT 1.2 codebase.
